configurationSet.description: The ARN of the Amazon SES configuration set that you want to apply to messages that you send through the channel.

enabled.description: Whether the channel is enabled or disabled. Defaults to `true`.

fromAddress.description: The email address used to send emails from. You can use email only (`user@example.com`) or friendly address (`User <user@example.com>`). This field comply with [RFC 5322](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc5322.txt).

identity.description: The ARN of an identity verified with SES.

messagesPerSecond.description: Messages per second that can be sent.

roleArn.description: The ARN of an IAM Role used to submit events to Mobile Analytics' event ingestion service.

roleArn.description: The ARN of an IAM Role used to submit events to Mobile Analytics' event ingestion service.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering EmailChannel resources.
